titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site as the "Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park", and for other purposes.
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
This bill redesignates the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site in New Hampshire as the Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park.
